dcfield_workflow_example
========================

.. py:module:: dcfield_workflow_example

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   DC Field Workflow Example
   =========================

   Workflow Example: Show complete research workflow from data to insight
   Style: Real data loading, preprocessing, analysis, visualization
   Audience: Researcher adapting to their own data

   This example demonstrates a complete workflow for analyzing DC field effects
   in quantum wire semiconductor devices with realistic parameters.



Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   dcfield_workflow_example.HAS_MATPLOTLIB


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   dcfield_workflow_example.create_realistic_quantum_wire_data
   dcfield_workflow_example.analyze_dc_field_response
   dcfield_workflow_example.analyze_momentum_distribution_evolution
   dcfield_workflow_example.create_comprehensive_visualization
   dcfield_workflow_example.main


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: HAS_MATPLOTLIB
   :value: True


.. py:function:: create_realistic_quantum_wire_data()

   Create realistic quantum wire parameters and data.


.. py:function:: analyze_dc_field_response(data, field_range)

   Analyze DC field response over a range of field strengths.


.. py:function:: analyze_momentum_distribution_evolution(data, Edc, time_steps)

   Analyze how momentum distribution evolves under DC field.


.. py:function:: create_comprehensive_visualization(data, field_results, evolution)

   Create comprehensive visualization of results.


.. py:function:: main()

   Main workflow example.
